ozpIwc.transport.participant.Base Class

Defined in: src/js/bus/transport/participant/base.js:12
Module: ozpIwc.transport.participant
Parent Module: ozpIwc.transport

Base class for Participant listeners. Should be inherited from for different browser transport components.

Constructor

ozpIwc.transport.participant.Base

(
  • [config]
)

Defined in src/js/bus/transport/participant/base.js:12

Parameters:

  • [config] Object optional
    • [router] ozpIwc.transport.Router optional
    • [metrics] ozpIwc.metric.Registry optional

      The metric registry to put this modules metrics in. If no registry metrics not taken

    • [authorization] ozpIwc.policyAuth.PDP optional

      The authorization component for this module.

  • Methods
  • Properties

connectToRouter

(
  • router
  • address
)

Defined in src/js/bus/transport/participant/base.js:194

Connects the participant to a given router.

Fires: - ozpIwc.transport.participant.Base/#connectedToRouter:event

Parameters:

  • router ozpIwc.transport.Router

    The router to connect to

  • address String

    The address to assign to the participant.

destroy

()

Defined in src/js/bus/transport/participant/base.js:364

Destroys this participant. The router will no longer reference it.

findParticipant

(
  • source
)

Provided by the ozpIwc.transport.listener module.

Defined in src/js/bus/transport/listener/listener.js:88

Finds the participant associated with the given window. Unfortunately, this is an o(n) algorithm, since there doesn't seem to be any way to hash, order, or any other way to compare windows other than equality.

Parameters:

  • source Object
    • the participant handle from message's event.source

ozpIwc.packet.Transport

receiveFromRouter

(
  • packetContext
)
Boolean

Defined in src/js/bus/transport/participant/base.js:128

Processes packets sent from the router to the participant. If a packet does not pass authorization it is marked forbidden.

Parameters:

  • packetContext ozpIwc.PacketContext

Returns:

Boolean:

true if this packet could have additional recipients
